data.text: @MerlinofCanada @cindanellie @Wetcoastlad @ElleWitch61 @Notabot79459396 @heatherdcoleman @jkenney It likely middle management pushing for a return after companies realized they aren’t really necessary.
@Meowshell1 @cindanellie @Wetcoastlad @ElleWitch61 @Notabot79459396 @heatherdcoleman @jkenney If you can do your job from home with no issues no one should be forced back to office

@MerlinofCanada @cindanellie @Wetcoastlad @ElleWitch61 @Notabot79459396 @heatherdcoleman @jkenney I enjoyed going into work. During the Teacher’s strike in ON I had to take 3 boys under 10 to work. During this pandemic I’d work from home as long as possible. I can’t, I’ve become disabled ergo living in government sanctioned abject poverty.
@heatherdcoleman @fayeg61 @MerlinofCanada YOU, are awesomesauce!!! You read my mind!!😂💗

@cindanellie @Wetcoastlad @ElleWitch61 @Notabot79459396 @heatherdcoleman @jkenney I helped a friend write a letter to her employer a large oil and gas company in March 2020 she worked from home since then then they called her to come in this month we wrote another letter said she was not going to the office to dangerous they asked for a Doctors letter now ok

@Wetcoastlad @ElleWitch61 @Notabot79459396 @MerlinofCanada @heatherdcoleman @jkenney My Doctor and my Cardiologist, completely restricted me from working, at the beginning of Dec./20, simply because I was born with a Congenital Heart Defect. I wrote Moe an email, telling him that, and asking HOW he plans on protecting us. I just got a generic response. 🙄🤦🏻‍♀️

@Wetcoastlad @ElleWitch61 @Notabot79459396 @MerlinofCanada @heatherdcoleman @jkenney Oh no! I’m so sorry!😔😢 I’m from Saskatchewan, and, my CONservative ‘Premier’ doesn’t care about us, either! At least your Premier isn’t a practicing alcoholic, that has actually MURDERED people, while behind the wheel. /1

@MerlinofCanada Parents really should be able to *personally sue* these premiers.

Unless something will *personally* Take Away Money from Kenney he doesn't give a damn.
@Notabot79459396 @MerlinofCanada @heatherdcoleman @jkenney And 27 C19 desths in the past 2 days. The dead need no beds. #BodyBagKenney
